metadata.title: CVE-2024-22667 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Vim before 9.0.2142 has a stack-based buffer overflow becausedid_set_langmap in map.c calls sprintf to write to the error buffer that ispassed down to the option callback functions.

criterions.comment: vim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
